briefTitle: Duloxetine Versus Placebo in the Prevention of Recurrence of Major Depressive Disorder
officialTitle: Duloxetine Versus Placebo in the Prevention of Recurrence of Major Depressive Disorder
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of duloxetine compared with placebo in the prevention of depressive recurrences among patients with recurrent major depressive disorder.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Depressive Recurrence After Time (t) in Days
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Every Visit from Week 34 up to Week 86 (Maintenance Phase)
